deleteModal.title: Delete Repository
deleteModal.warning: The repository will be completely deleted including local files. Do you want to continue?

removeFromListModal.title: Remove from List
removeFromListModal.warning: The repository will be removed from the list only. Local files will not be deleted. Do you want to continue?

resetModal.title: Reset All Data
resetModal.warning: All app data will be reset. This action cannot be undone. Do you want to continue?

versionModal.title: Change Version
versionModal.warning: All changes will be lost. Do you want to change to version {version}?

settings.title: Settings
settings.rootPathDescription: Directory where repositories will be cloned
settings.resetDataDescription: Reset all app data including repository list and settings

errors.nameInvalid: Only letters, numbers, underscores, and dashes allowed
